name: Vibrelli Mini Bike Pump - Presta & Schrader Bicycle Pump - 120 PSI Tire Pump for Road & MTB - No Valve Changing Needed
short_description: "SUPER-FIT" Clever Valve - No adaptors needed. Automatically locks onto both Schrader and Presta valves, no leaks, no valve changing needed. IMPORTANT: doesn’t come with separate valve adaptors because it locks onto both Presta and Schrader valves automatically.

120 PSI Extendable Telescope Design: Switch from high-volume inflation to high-pressure inflation. Perfect mini bike pump for road bikes and MTBs. NOT suitable for inflating bike suspension. Pump does not have a gauge.
Secure Mounting Bracket - Bracket attaches to the bike’s bottle cage holes (screws included). Velcro strap holds the bicycle pump firmly to the mounting bracket, no rattles or lost pumps.
Glueless Puncture Kit Included - Be prepared for a flat tire anywhere, anytime
Ironclad Warranty: Backed by our 5-year manufacturers warranty. This mini bike pump is designed by cyclists for cyclists and built to last
product_description: Faster Inflation - 110 PSI: Designed for quick inflation with a high volume, long barrel allowing more air flow per pump, reaching 110 PSI with ease Accurate Gauge - Inline pressure gauge is integrated into the pump hose - 360 degree PSI window - Perfect air pump for road and mountain bike tires "Super-Seal" Valve Won't Leak - Schrader & Presta: The bicycle pump comes with "Super Seal" connector that screws to both presta and schrader valves - seals tight with no leaks. The flexible hose allows for easy valve access without bending or damaging them. Secure Mounting Bracket: Pump comes with a mounting bracket that screws to the bottle cage holes - the mini pump locks into place and is held tight with a silicone band that won't pop out when riding, and no annoying bike pump rattling. Ironclad Warranty - Backed by a 5-year manufacturers warranty. This Mini Pump is designed by cyclists for cyclists and built to last.

name: GEWAGE Bicycle Phone Mount Bag & Bicycle Tire Pump, Bike Multitool with Tyre Lever - Bike Tool Kits for Repair and Maintenance at Home or On The Road
short_description: 【Ideal Bike Tool Set】: The Bike accessories includes virtually every tool you could need for most trailside repairs. It includes a bicycle phone mount bag, a 120 psi bike pump and a 14 in 1 bike multitool. With these bike tool, you can handle unexpected emergencies like a pro and avoid letting unforeseen issues disrupt your travel plans. Say goodbye to unexpected bike troubles and enjoy your rides worry-free!

【Top Tube Phone Bag】: Clear TPU screen provides the best viewing angle of your device in any riding position. There’s a port at the bottom of the smartphone compartment for running a power cable or wired headphones. The two bottom straps are plenty long to deal with most top tube or front triangle configurations, and there’s a third stem strap to offer side-to-side stability.

【15-in-1 Bike Multitool】: Includes 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8 and 10 mm hex wrenches, T25 Torx, and flat screwdriver, for on-the-ride adjustment of brakes, handlebars, saddles, or derailleurs. The chain tool is useful for emergency chain repair and can also be used for complete chain removal and installation. The bike tire lever can be a lifesaver when dealing with a flat tire, and includes integrated spoke wrenches for triage of loose or broken spokes.

【Super Large Space】: Our bike top tube bag is suitable for smartphone up to 7.4 inches. (For iPhone 11/12/iPhone11 iPhone 12 Pro/XS/XR/XS/Max,For Samsung Galaxy S9/S8/Note 10/20/20 Ultra/S21.)It also has large interior for mobile phone, power bank, wallet, bike repair kit, bike pump, small water bottle and more. Enough inside room for long rides, holds a lot of daily needs.

【Portable Bike Pump】: With smart compatible valve fit Schrader & Presta valves automatically, The bike pump can quickly fill up your bike tires in case of an emergency with air pressure up to 120 PSI. Attach pump to bike frame, using hook and loop straps and fixing screws hold the pump tightly. Fit for Mountain, Road, BMX, MTB bike, Electric bicycle, Kids bike.
